import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{toast,ToastContainer}from"react-toastify";import"react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css";import"./../Subscriptions.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Subscriptions=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:"",phone:"",email:""});const[errors,setErrors]=useState({name:"",phone:"",email:""});const validateForm=()=>{let isValid=true;const newErrors={name:"",phone:"",email:""};if(formData.name.trim()===""){newErrors.name="Name is required";isValid=false;}if(!/^\d{10}$/.test(formData.phone)){newErrors.phone="Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number";isValid=false;}if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(formData.email)){newErrors.email="Please enter a valid email address";isValid=false;}setErrors(newErrors);return isValid;};const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(validateForm()){// Form is valid, user can submit the data
console.log("Form submitted:",formData);// Show success toast
toast.success("Subscription successful!",{position:"bottom-center",autoClose:5000,hideProgressBar:false,closeOnClick:true,pauseOnHover:true,draggable:true,progress:undefined,theme:"light"});}else{// Form is invalid, show error toast
toast.error("Please fix the errors in the form.",{position:"bottom-center",autoClose:5000,hideProgressBar:false,closeOnClick:true,pauseOnHover:true,draggable:true,progress:undefined,theme:"light"});}};useEffect(()=>{document.title="Subscriptions - The Little Corner Cafe";return()=>{};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"subscriptions-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Coffee News Subscription"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"error",children:errors.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"phone",children:"Phone:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"tel",id:"phone",name:"phone",value:formData.phone,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"error",children:errors.phone})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",name:"email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"error",children:errors.email})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Subscribe"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToastContainer,{position:"bottom-center",autoClose:5000,hideProgressBar:false,newestOnTop:false,closeOnClick:true,rtl:false,pauseOnFocusLoss:true,draggable:true,pauseOnHover:true,theme:"light"})]});};export default Subscriptions;
